name: Tuscan Chicken Marinade
description: The robust flavours of Tuscany with a few simple ingredients, and whisked together in minutes! Perfect for chicken, pork, lamb, even veggies.

ingredients.name: Tuscan Chicken Burger Seasoning or Italian Seasoning

preparation: Whisk all ingredients together in a bowl.
Use the same day, refrigerate up to 5 days, or portion marinated meats and freeze.

products.name: Tuscan Chicken Burger Seasoning
summary: A Mediterranean inspired blend that pairs perfectly with your choice of ground chicken or turkey. A robust seasoning with tiny nuggets of garlic, sun-kissed tomatoes and red bell peppers that soften into bursts of flavour.

products.name: Italian Seasoning
summary: A robust Italian blend perfect for pizza, bread dough, pasta or flatbreads.
